name: Red union 5
description:
This series of works I dedicate to color. Red is a sense of strength and greatness. All the pictures show women in the best versions of themselves. The woman, like the red color for me, conveys sexuality, beauty and power. And the crimson color goes hand in hand with the woman. Every job has its meaning, but I suggest you find something in common in each peace.

Beauty. In the 21st century, everyone began to say that only the beauty of the soul was mattered, and how do you look were not the most important thing. I don’t agree with that. A person is a man who combines style, intelligence, beauty, refinement, charm and uniqueness! A handsome man is handsome in everything. They say that by the look on your face and your eyes you can understand what’s in a person’s heart - so this picture doesn’t need a face.
